Detailed Description

Special class that listens for render messages from RenderOriginators.

Remarks:
This class fills the role of "Observer" in the observer pattern.

void RenderableListener::notifyAddedToOriginator ( RenderOriginator *  origin  )  [inline]

Notify the RenderableListener that it has been registered to a RenderOriginator.

Parameters:
origin The RenderOriginator that the RenderableListener was registered with.
Remarks:
This is an internal method and should not be called manually.

void RenderableListener::removeFromRenderOriginators (  ) 

Remove the RenderableListener from all of the RenderOriginators that use it.

Remarks:
This should be called in the deconstructor of all subclasses of RenderableListener.
